title: [caffe2] compile with multi-threads
body_html:
when compiling with caffe2, I use

mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
sudo make -j10

The last line of codes output error like:

collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:7855: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2.so' failed
make[2]: *** [lib/libcaffe2.so] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:2846: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

when compiling with caffe2, I use

body:
when compiling with caffe2, I use
```bash
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
sudo make -j10
```
The last line of codes output error like:
```
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:7855: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2.so' failed
make[2]: *** [lib/libcaffe2.so] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:2846: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
